verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, came אַחַר֙ <S%H310><s%> 'a-Char And it came to pass after הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> had-de-va-Rim these things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh, these כֶּ֧רֶם <S%H3754><s%> Ke-rem had a vineyard הָיָ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah had לְנָב֥וֹת <S%H5022><s%> le-na-Vot [that] Naboth הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִ֖י <S%H3158><s%> hai-yiz-re-'e-Li the Jezreelite אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בְּיִזְרְעֶ֑אל <S%H3157><s%> be-yiz-re-'El; which [was] in Jezreel אֵ֚צֶל <S%H681><s%> 'E-tzel hard by הֵיכַ֣ל <S%H1964><s%> hei-Chal the palace אַחְאָ֔ב <S%H256><s%> 'ach-'Av, of Ahab מֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H8111><s%> sho-me-Ron. of Samaria

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake אַחְאָ֣ב <S%H256><s%> 'ach-'Av And Ahab אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to נָב֣וֹת׀ <S%H5022><s%> na-Vot unto Naboth לֵאמֹר֩׀ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor saying תְּנָה־ <S%H5414><s%> te-nah- Give לִּ֨י li אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כַּרְמְךָ֜ <S%H3754><s%> kar-me-Cha me thy vineyard וִֽיהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vi-hi- may have לִ֣י li לְגַן־ <S%H1588><s%> le-gan- that I may have it for a garden יָרָ֗ק <S%H3419><s%> ya-Rak, of herbs כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki because ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu it קָרוֹב֙ <S%H7138><s%> ka-rOv because it [is] near אֵ֣צֶל <S%H681><s%> 'E-tzel unto בֵּיתִ֔י <S%H1004><s%> bei-Ti, my house וְאֶתְּנָ֤ה <S%H5414><s%> ve-'et-te-Nah and I will give לְךָ֙ le-Cha תַּחְתָּ֔יו <S%H8478><s%> tach-Tav, place כֶּ֖רֶם <S%H3754><s%> Ke-rem vineyard ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov thee for it a better מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu; than אִ֚ם <S%H518><s%> 'im if ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov than it [or] if it seem good בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei-cha, to thee אֶתְּנָה־ <S%H5414><s%> 'et-te-nah- I will give לְךָ֥ le-Cha כֶ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Che-sef of it in money מְחִ֥יר <S%H4242><s%> me-Chir thee the worth זֶֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> Zeh. he

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said נָב֖וֹת <S%H5022><s%> na-Vot And Naboth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַחְאָ֑ב <S%H256><s%> 'ach-'Av; to Ahab חָלִ֤ילָה <S%H2486><s%> cha-Li-lah forbid לִּי֙ li מֵֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, The LORD מִתִּתִּ֛י <S%H5414><s%> mit-tit-Ti it me that I should give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נַחֲלַ֥ת <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lat the inheritance אֲבֹתַ֖י <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tai of my fathers לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

וַיָּבֹא֩ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo came אַחְאָ֨ב <S%H256><s%> 'ach-'Av And Ahab אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into בֵּית֜וֹ <S%H1004><s%> bei-To into his house סַ֣ר <S%H5620><s%> sar heavy וְזָעֵ֗ף <S%H2198><s%> ve-za-'Ef, and displeased עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- because הַדָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var because of the word אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber had spoken אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, about נָבוֹת֙ <S%H5022><s%> na-Vot which Naboth הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִ֔י <S%H3158><s%> hai-yiz-re-'e-Li, the Jezreelite וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer to him for he had said לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- no אֶתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> 'et-Ten I will not give לְךָ֖ le-Cha אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נַחֲלַ֣ת <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lat thee the inheritance אֲבוֹתָ֑י <S%H1><s%> a-vo-Tai; of my fathers וַיִּשְׁכַּב֙ <S%H7901><s%> vai-yish-Kav And he laid him down עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- because מִטָּת֔וֹ <S%H4296><s%> mit-ta-To, upon his bed וַיַּסֵּ֥ב <S%H5437><s%> vai-yas-Sev and turned away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nav his face וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- no אָ֥כַל <S%H398><s%> 'A-chal and would eat לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H3899><s%> La-chem. no bread

וַתָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> vat-ta-Vo came אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav But אִיזֶ֣בֶל <S%H348><s%> 'i-Ze-vel But Jezebel אִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <S%H802><s%> ish-To; his wife וַתְּדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> vat-te-dab-Ber to him and said אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, to him מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- How זֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> zeh he רוּחֲךָ֣ <S%H7307><s%> ru-cha-Cha unto him Why is thy spirit סָרָ֔ה <S%H5620><s%> sa-Rah, so sad וְאֵינְךָ֖ <S%H369><s%> ve-'ei-ne-Cha you are not אֹכֵ֥ל <S%H398><s%> 'o-Chel that thou eatest לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H3899><s%> La-chem. bread

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber And he said אֵלֶ֗יהָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-ha, to her כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- Because אֲ֠דַבֵּר <S%H1696><s%> 'A-dab-ber unto her Because I spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to נָב֨וֹת <S%H5022><s%> na-Vot unto Naboth הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִ֜י <S%H3158><s%> hai-yiz-re-'e-Li the Jezreelite וָאֹ֣מַר <S%H559><s%> va-'O-mar and said ל֗וֹ lo, תְּנָה־ <S%H5414><s%> te-nah- unto him Give לִּ֤י li אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כַּרְמְךָ֙ <S%H3754><s%> kar-me-Cha me thy vineyard בְּכֶ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> be-Che-sef, for money א֚וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if חָפֵ֣ץ <S%H2655><s%> cha-Fetz or else if it please אַתָּ֔ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah, I אֶתְּנָה־ <S%H5414><s%> 'et-te-nah- thee I will give לְךָ֥ le-Cha כֶ֖רֶם <S%H3754><s%> Che-rem thee [another] vineyard תַּחְתָּ֑יו <S%H8478><s%> tach-Tav; Thahash וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer for it and he answered לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- I will not אֶתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> 'et-Ten I will not give לְךָ֖ le-Cha אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כַּרְמִֽי׃ <S%H3754><s%> kar-Mi. thee my vineyard

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer said אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav about אִיזֶ֣בֶל <S%H348><s%> 'i-Ze-vel And Jezebel אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <S%H802><s%> ish-To, his wife אַתָּ֕ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you עַתָּ֛ה <S%H6258><s%> 'at-Tah now תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh unto him Dost thou now govern מְלוּכָ֖ה <S%H4410><s%> me-lu-Chah the kingdom עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; Israel ק֤וּם <S%H6965><s%> kum abide אֱכָל־ <S%H398><s%> 'e-chol- [and] eat לֶ֙חֶם֙ <S%H3899><s%> le-chem bread וְיִטַ֣ב <S%H3190><s%> ve-yi-Tav be merry לִבֶּ֔ךָ <S%H3820><s%> lib-Be-cha, and let thine heart אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I אֶתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> 'et-Ten I will give לְךָ֔ le-Cha, אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כֶּ֖רֶם <S%H3754><s%> Ke-rem thee the vineyard נָב֥וֹת <S%H5022><s%> na-Vot of Naboth הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִֽי׃ <S%H3158><s%> hai-yiz-re-'e-Li. the Jezreelite

וַתִּכְתֹּ֤ב <S%H3789><s%> vat-tich-To So she wrote סְפָרִים֙ <S%H5612><s%> se-fa-Rim letters בְּשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> be-Shem name אַחְאָ֔ב <S%H256><s%> 'ach-'Av, in Ahab's וַתַּחְתֹּ֖ם <S%H2368><s%> vat-tach-Tom [them] with his seal בְּחֹתָמ֑וֹ <S%H2856><s%> be-cho-ta-Mo; and sealed וַתִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> vat-tish-Lach and sent; הַסְפָרִים has-fa-rim כסְפָרִ֗ים <S%H5612><s%> se-fa-Rim, letters קאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַזְקֵנִ֤ים <S%H2205><s%> haz-ke-Nim unto the elders וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to הַֽחֹרִים֙ <S%H2715><s%> ha-cho-Rim and to the nobles אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בְּעִיר֔וֹ <S%H5892><s%> be-'i-Ro, that [were] in his city הַיֹּשְׁבִ֖ים <S%H3427><s%> hai-yo-she-Vim dwelling אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with נָבֽוֹת׃ <S%H5022><s%> na-Vot. with Naboth

וַתִּכְתֹּ֥ב <S%H3789><s%> vat-tich-To And she wrote בַּסְּפָרִ֖ים <S%H5612><s%> bas-se-fa-Rim in the letters לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying קִֽרְאוּ־ <S%H7121><s%> kir-'u- Proclaim צ֔וֹם <S%H6685><s%> Tzom, a fast וְהוֹשִׁ֥יבוּ <S%H3427><s%> ve-ho-Shi-vu and set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נָב֖וֹת <S%H5022><s%> na-Vot Naboth בְּרֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> be-Rosh on high הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am. among the people

וְ֠הוֹשִׁיבוּ <S%H3427><s%> Ve-ho-shi-vu And set שְׁנַ֨יִם <S%H8147><s%> she-Na-yim two אֲנָשִׁ֥ים <S%H582><s%> 'a-na-Shim men בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- sons בְלִיַּעַל֮ <S%H1100><s%> ve-li-ya-'Al of Belial נֶגְדּוֹ֒ <S%H5048><s%> neg-Do before וִיעִדֻ֣הוּ <S%H5749><s%> vi-'i-Du-hu before him to bear witness לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, against him saying בֵּרַ֥כְתָּ <S%H1288><s%> be-Rach-ta Thou didst blaspheme אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God וָמֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> va-Me-lech; and the king וְהוֹצִיאֻ֥הוּ <S%H3318><s%> ve-ho-tzi-'U-hu And [then] carry him out וְסִקְלֻ֖הוּ <S%H5619><s%> ve-sik-Lu-hu and stone וְיָמֹֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> ve-ya-Mot. him that he may die

וַיַּעֲשׂוּ֩ <S%H6213><s%> vai-ya-'a-Su did אַנְשֵׁ֨י <S%H376><s%> 'an-Shei the men עִיר֜וֹ <S%H5892><s%> i-Ro of his city הַזְּקֵנִ֣ים <S%H2205><s%> haz-ze-ke-Nim [even] the elders וְהַחֹרִ֗ים <S%H2715><s%> ve-ha-cho-Rim, and the nobles אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who הַיֹּֽשְׁבִים֙ <S%H3427><s%> hai-yo-she-Vim who were the inhabitants בְּעִיר֔וֹ <S%H5892><s%> be-'i-Ro, in his city כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher which שָׁלְחָ֥ה <S%H7971><s%> sha-le-Chah had sent אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem as אִיזָ֑בֶל <S%H348><s%> 'i-Za-vel; as Jezebel כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher who כָּתוּב֙ <S%H3789><s%> ka-Tuv unto them [and] as it [was] written בַּסְּפָרִ֔ים <S%H5612><s%> bas-se-fa-Rim, in the letters אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who שָׁלְחָ֖ה <S%H7971><s%> sha-le-Chah which she had sent אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem. about

קָרְא֖וּ <S%H7121><s%> ka-re-'U They proclaimed צ֑וֹם <S%H6685><s%> Tzom; a fast וְהֹשִׁ֥יבוּ <S%H3427><s%> ve-ho-Shi-vu and set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נָב֖וֹת <S%H5022><s%> na-Vot Naboth בְּרֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> be-Rosh on high הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am. among the people

וַ֠יָּבֹאוּ <S%H935><s%> Vai-ya-vo-'u And there came שְׁנֵ֨י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei in two הָאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <S%H376><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim men בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- children בְלִיַּעַל֮ <S%H1100><s%> ve-li-ya-'Al of Belial וַיֵּשְׁב֣וּ <S%H3427><s%> vai-ye-she-Vu and sat נֶגְדּוֹ֒ <S%H5048><s%> neg-Do before וַיְעִדֻהוּ֩ <S%H5749><s%> vay-'i-du-Hu witnessed אַנְשֵׁ֨י <S%H376><s%> 'an-Shei men הַבְּלִיַּ֜עַל <S%H1100><s%> hab-be-li-Ya-'al of Belial אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נָב֗וֹת <S%H5022><s%> na-Vot, against him [even] against Naboth נֶ֤גֶד <S%H5048><s%> Ne-ged before הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am in the presence of the people לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying בֵּרַ֥ךְ <S%H1288><s%> be-Rach did blaspheme נָב֛וֹת <S%H5022><s%> na-Vot Naboth אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God וָמֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> va-Me-lech; and the king וַיֹּצִאֻ֙הוּ֙ <S%H3318><s%> vai-yo-tzi-'U-hu Then they carried him forth מִח֣וּץ <S%H2351><s%> mi-Chutz out לָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> la-'Ir, of the city וַיִּסְקְלֻ֥הוּ <S%H5619><s%> vai-yis-ke-Lu-hu and stoned בָאֲבָנִ֖ים <S%H68><s%> va-'a-va-Nim him with stones וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> vai-ya-Mot. that he died
